div.ab: To dye blue: Take for each pound of string one ounce of sumac(?) and let it boil in water for a half hour. And after that, put(?) it through a cloth, and then take the string and wet it in the water that has come out of the cloth, and after that let it dry. After that take for each pound of string three glasses of elderberries that are black, and take for each pound of string one bushel of lisia(?) that is brighter, and after that put the elder berries in the lisia(?) and let it boil together until it becomes/gives off a fine blue, and then let it boil until it becomes blue, and then take (some?) and let it dry. So will it be very nice.
